cause.description:
Alzheimer's is a deadly disease that needs to have a cure...fast!! Approximately 5.3 million Americans are suffering from Alzheimer's Disease as we speak!! We need to put our foot down & research... so we can find a cure for this awful disease so nobody loses their memory or lives anymore!!
Go to this site to learn more about this disease:
www.nm-alzheimers.org
1. There is approximately 5.3 million Americans living with Alzheimer's Disease right now
2. A cure for Alzheimer's has not been discovered yet
3. The government & you need to do more for finding a cure for Alzheimer's Disease
cause.mission: Raise Money To Find A Cure For Alzheimer's Disease
cause.name: Finding A Cure For Alzheimer's Disease
